segments.text: Hey , Susie , what health club do you belong to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I ’ Ve been going to Athletic Express , but I don ’ t like it there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Why not ? I hear it ’ s pretty good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The people don ’ t really work out there . They just stand around and talk all the time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it ’ s one of those places .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , they have different rooms . I lift weights by the pool where there aren ’ t so many people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do they have a lot of equipment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , they have all the machines , a pool , and a steam room and sauna .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The usual . Aerobics , kickboxing , yoga . They just started a Tai Chi class too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I have a guest pass . Why don ’ t you come with me tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Thanks . I ’ ll stop by when I get off work .
segments.speaker: S1
